Method Detail

getZooKeeperClient

public static ZooKeeperClient getZooKeeperClient(String address)
Deprecated. 
Factory method for retrieving an instance of ZooKeeperClient connected to the provided quorum address. Will reuse existing connections if possible. The caller is responsible for releasing the ZooKeeperClient.

Parameters:
address - of ZooKeeper quorum.
Returns:
a ZooKeeperClient.

isOpen

public boolean isOpen()
Deprecated. 
Returns whether this ZooKeeperClient has been opened and not closed.

Returns:
whether this ZooKeeperClient has been opened and not closed.

getZKClient

public org.apache.zookeeper.ZooKeeper getZKClient(double timeout)
Deprecated. 
Reports the ZooKeeper session client.

Parameters:
timeout - If no ZooKeeper session may be established within the specified timeout, in seconds, this fails and returns null. 0 or negative means no timeout, ie. potentially wait forever.
Returns:
A live ZooKeeper session client, or null.

getZKClient

public org.apache.zookeeper.ZooKeeper getZKClient()
Deprecated. 
Reports the ZooKeeper session client.

This may potentially wait forever: no timeout.

Returns:
the ZooKeeper session client.

create

public File create(File path,
                   byte[] data,
                   List<org.apache.zookeeper.data.ACL> acl,
                   org.apache.zookeeper.CreateMode createMode)
            throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException
Deprecated. 
See ZooKeeper.create(String, byte[], List, CreateMode).

Parameters:
path - to desired node.
data - the desired node should contain by default.
acl - is the Access Control List the desired node will use.
createMode - specifies whether the node to be created is ephemeral and/or sequential.
Returns:
the actual path of the created node.
Throws:
org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException - on ZooKeeper errors. Connection related errors are handled by retrying the operations.

                                      throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException
Deprecated.

                         throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException
Deprecated. 
See ZooKeeper.getChildren(String, Watcher, Stat).

Parameters:
path - of a parent node.
watcher - to trigger upon parent node deletion or creation/deletion of a child node.
stat - of the provided parent node.
Returns:
an unordered array of the parent node's children.

org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException - on ZooKeeper errors. Connection related errors are handled by retrying the operations.
